parameters.name: farmId
parameters.description: The farm ID of the farm in the fleet.

parameters.name: fleetId
parameters.description: The fleet ID of the fleet to get.

nested_items.name: fleetId
nested_items.description: The fleet ID.

nested_items.name: farmId
nested_items.description: The farm ID of the farm in the fleet.

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the fleet.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the fleet.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The Auto Scaling status of the fleet.

nested_items.name: autoScalingStatus
nested_items.description: The Auto Scaling status of the fleet. Either GROWING, STEADY, or SHRINKING.

nested_items.name: targetWorkerCount
nested_items.description: The number of target workers in the fleet.

nested_items.name: workerCount
nested_items.description: The number of workers in the fleet.

nested_items.name: minWorkerCount
nested_items.description: The minimum number of workers specified in the fleet.

nested_items.name: maxWorkerCount
nested_items.description: The maximum number of workers specified in the fleet.

nested_items.name: configuration
nested_items.description: The configuration setting for the fleet.

nested_items.name: customerManaged
nested_items.description: The customer managed fleets within a fleet configuration.

nested_items.name: mode
nested_items.description: The Auto Scaling mode for the customer managed fleet configuration.

nested_items.name: workerCapabilities
nested_items.description: The worker capabilities for a customer managed fleet configuration.

nested_items.name: vCpuCount
nested_items.description: The vCPU count for the customer manged worker capabilities.

nested_items.name: min
nested_items.description: The minimum amount of vCPU.

nested_items.name: max
nested_items.description: The maximum amount of vCPU.

nested_items.name: memoryMiB
nested_items.description: The memory (MiB).

nested_items.name: min
nested_items.description: The minimum amount of memory (in MiB).

nested_items.name: max
nested_items.description: The maximum amount of memory (in MiB).

nested_items.name: acceleratorTypes
nested_items.description: The accelerator types for the customer managed worker capabilities.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: acceleratorCount
nested_items.description: The range of the accelerator.

nested_items.name: min
nested_items.description: The minimum number of GPU accelerators in the worker host.

nested_items.name: max
nested_items.description: The maximum number of GPU accelerators in the worker host.

nested_items.name: acceleratorTotalMemoryMiB
nested_items.description: The total memory (MiB) for the customer managed worker capabilities.

nested_items.name: min
nested_items.description: The minimum amount of memory to use for the accelerator, measured in MiB.

nested_items.name: max
nested_items.description: The maximum amount of memory to use for the accelerator, measured in MiB.

nested_items.name: osFamily
nested_items.description: The operating system (OS) family.

nested_items.name: cpuArchitectureType
nested_items.description: The CPU architecture type for the customer managed worker capabilities.

nested_items.name: customAmounts
nested_items.description: Custom requirement ranges for customer managed worker capabilities.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the fleet capability.

nested_items.name: min
nested_items.description: The minimum amount of fleet worker capability.

nested_items.name: max
nested_items.description: The maximum amount of the fleet worker capability.

nested_items.name: customAttributes
nested_items.description: Custom attributes for the customer manged worker capabilities.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the fleet attribute capability for the worker.

nested_items.name: values
nested_items.description: The number of fleet attribute capabilities.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: storageProfileId
nested_items.description: The storage profile ID.

nested_items.name: tagPropagationMode
nested_items.description: Specifies whether tags associated with a fleet are attached to workers when the worker is launched.

nested_items.name: serviceManagedEc2
nested_items.description: The service managed Amazon EC2 instances for a fleet configuration.

nested_items.name: instanceCapabilities
nested_items.description: The Amazon EC2 instance capabilities.

nested_items.name: vCpuCount
nested_items.description: The amount of vCPU to require for instances in this fleet.

nested_items.name: min
nested_items.description: The minimum amount of vCPU.

nested_items.name: max
nested_items.description: The maximum amount of vCPU.

nested_items.name: memoryMiB
nested_items.description: The memory, as MiB, for the Amazon EC2 instance type.

nested_items.name: min
nested_items.description: The minimum amount of memory (in MiB).

nested_items.name: max
nested_items.description: The maximum amount of memory (in MiB).

nested_items.name: osFamily
nested_items.description: The operating system (OS) family.

nested_items.name: cpuArchitectureType
nested_items.description: The CPU architecture type.

nested_items.name: rootEbsVolume
nested_items.description: The root EBS volume.

nested_items.name: sizeGiB
nested_items.description: The EBS volume size in GiB.

nested_items.name: iops
nested_items.description: The IOPS per volume.

nested_items.name: throughputMiB
nested_items.description: The throughput per volume in MiB.

nested_items.name: acceleratorCapabilities
nested_items.description: Describes the GPU accelerator capabilities required for worker host instances in this fleet.

nested_items.name: selections
nested_items.description: A list of accelerator capabilities requested for this fleet. Only Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud instances that provide these capabilities will be used. For example, if you specify both L4 and T4 chips, Deadline Cloud will use Amazon EC2 instances that have either the L4 or the T4 chip installed.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the chip used by the GPU accelerator.
t4 - NVIDIA T4 Tensor Core GPU.
a10g - NVIDIA A10G Tensor Core GPU.
l4 - NVIDIA L4 Tensor Core GPU.
l40s - NVIDIA L40S Tensor Core GPU.

nested_items.name: runtime
nested_items.description: Specifies the runtime driver to use for the GPU accelerator. You must use the same runtime for all GPUs.
latest - Use the latest runtime available for the chip. If you specify latest and a new version of the runtime is released, the new version of the runtime is used.
grid:r550 - NVIDIA vGPU software 17
grid:r535 - NVIDIA vGPU software 16

nested_items.name: min
nested_items.description: The minimum number of GPU accelerators in the worker host.

nested_items.name: max
nested_items.description: The maximum number of GPU accelerators in the worker host.

nested_items.name: allowedInstanceTypes
nested_items.description: The allowable Amazon EC2 instance types.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: excludedInstanceTypes
nested_items.description: The instance types to exclude from the fleet.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: customAmounts
nested_items.description: The custom capability amounts to require for instances in this fleet.

nested_items.description: The name of the fleet capability.

nested_items.name: max
nested_items.description: The maximum amount of the fleet worker capability.

nested_items.name: customAttributes
nested_items.description: The custom capability attributes to require for instances in this fleet.
